Class ClassicControllerButtonsEvent

java.lang.Object
  wiiusej.wiiusejevents.GenericEvent
      wiiusej.wiiusejevents.physicalevents.ButtonsEvent
          wiiusej.wiiusejevents.physicalevents.ClassicControllerButtonsEvent

public class ClassicControllerButtonsEvent
extends ButtonsEvent

Class which represents a buttons event from a Classic controller.

guiguito

Constructor Detail

ClassicControllerButtonsEvent

public ClassicControllerButtonsEvent(int id,
                                     short buttonsJustPressed,
                                     short buttonsJustReleased,
                                     short buttonsHeld)
Constructor of the classic controller buttons Event.

Parameters:
id - id of the wiimote.
buttonsJustPressed - buttons just pressed.
buttonsJustReleased - buttons just released.
buttonsHeld - buttons just pressed.
